aboutUs.heading: About Us
aboutUs.description: Chao Mao Bird Club CMBC, WE GIVE NOT ONLY WHAT YOU NEED BUT ALSO WHAT YOU DESIRE
aboutUs.founder: Founded in 2012 by Mr. Duy, the Chao Mao Bird Club has been active in VietNam for over 11 years. Our mission is to encourage and promote birdwatching, conservation and contest and beyond.
aboutUs.mission: As CMBC, we always listen and understand the needs of not only finding a place to stop but also an environment and services that bring comfort and safety to customers.Dear customers!

footer.text: We welcome donations in any amount to help fund club initiatives and activities, such as the purchase of bird seed for feeding birds, necessaries for harmed bird treatments, the annual Contests, Field trips and other club events, the purchase of supplies and tools for our volunteer projects, etc.
